div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Immunization|5.0.0 to FHIR Extensions Packversion: 5.2.0)

tr.td: Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Immunization.basedOn` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Immunization.basedOn` has a context of Immunization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Immunization`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Immunization.supportingInformation` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Immunization.performer.actor` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Immunization.performer.actor` as `SourceIsBroaderThanTarget`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.

div.p: Group 4 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Immunization|5.0.0 to unspecified code system
